casebody.data:
No. 10-8446. Charles Pointer, Petitioner v. Ida Early, et al. 562 U.S. 1284, 131 S. Ct. 1690,

179 L. Ed. 2d 612,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 2123. March 21, 2011.

Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied, and petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eighth Circuit dismissed. See Rule 39.8.
